The Patterns Libray of Growing Up NYC contains a shared vocabulary between the code, design, and user interface (UI) of Growing Up NYC.

Growing Up NYC supports the cognitive, social, emotional, and physical development of all New York City children by shaping City policies, agency practices, and program development.

Features

  • Mobile-first stylesheets.
  • Module-based design patterns with CSS and JavaScript included.
  • Multilingual stylesheets with right-to-left and left-to-right reading orientations.
  • Tailwindcss integration.

Getting Started

The Patterns are available as an NPM package and can be installed with the following command:

npm install @nycopportunity/growingup-patterns
